meanings.definition: To convert into gelatin or jelly.
meanings.sent1: She was gelatinizing the fruit juice to make a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent2: The chef is gelatinizing the broth to create a savory aspic.
meanings.sent3: The kids found it funny when their science experiment ended up gelatinizing into a wobbly mess.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight seemed to be gelatinizing the puddles on the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The process of gelatinizing the mixture made the kitchen smell sweet and inviting.

meanings.sent1: The dessert is gelatinizing in the fridge and will be ready to eat soon.
meanings.sent2: The liquid is slowly gelatinizing as it cools down.
meanings.sent3: The slime toy accidentally gelatinized in the sun, much to the amusement of the kids.
meanings.sent4: The fog was gelatinizing the landscape, giving it a dreamy appearance.
meanings.sent5: The jellyfish appeared to be gelatinizing as it floated gracefully in the water.
